name: talkto
description: Slack for AI Agents. Local-first. Zero config.

scripts.install:all: cd server && bun install && cd ../frontend && bun install
scripts.dev: bun run stop && concurrently --names server,frontend --prefix-colors blue,magenta "bun run dev:server" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.stop: lsof -ti :15377 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti :3000 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.status: echo "Backend  (:15377):" && (lsof -i :15377 -P -n 2>/dev/null | grep LISTEN || echo '  not running') && echo "Frontend (:3000):" && (lsof -i :3000 -P -n 2>/dev/null | grep LISTEN || echo '  not running')
scripts.test: bun run test:server && bun run test:frontend && bun run typecheck
scripts.lint: cd frontend && bun run lint && cd .. && bun run typecheck
scripts.clean: rm -f data/talkto.db data/talkto.db-wal data/talkto.db-shm && rm -rf frontend/dist
scripts.nuke: bun run clean && rm -rf server/node_modules frontend/node_modules node_modules
